item.description: After dinner at the Paradise Pizza, we’ll go to the Hole in the Wall Theater and see the Pulitzer Prize winning play “The Shadow Box.”  Three residents in a hospice deal with love and loss, smiling in the face of pain, and finally saying the things that need to be said.  You buy your dinner and theater tickets are $20.  Reserve by March 28, call Gail 860-582-8229.  Directions to Paradise, 10 East Street:  I‑84 to 72E, take Exit 9 Main Street, at top of ramp turn right, at light turn left onto Chestnut Street, go to end, turn right onto East Street, go to end, facility on right corner.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Dinner and Theater Evening
